replies.body: Is anyone having trouble with Steadfast Presence? For me, Tristana still jump over it and Malphite ploughs straight through.
Malphite's ult isn't called "Unstoppable Force" for nothing mate. ;)
Malphite can't be stopped by it but I don't know about Tristana
but malphs ult is still a dash..
Doesn't matter, malph can still ult through azir wall too. Like the guy above said, it isn't called unstoppable force for no reason.
Malphite's Ult is supposed to be blockable, isn't it?
Malphite is unstoppable for his ultimate. Tristana will be a bug.
i dont believe it is a bug, because {{champion:78}}'s w stops dashes whereas tristanas jump is just that, a jump.
Knowing Riot...Yorick probably caused it.
thanks that actually helped me a lot. recommended
The ability videos for poppy in client shows the old poppy's abilities.
I am so exited for this new poppy
Battle Bunny Rengar skin please {{champion:107}}
poppy sucks now

I misread the link "Poppy heroically charges to live"
Thinking that they meant live as in escape with her life, rather than live as in live in league.
I sense a new poppy skin around the corner {{champion:78}}
Hoppy: Bunny Poppy skin incoming {{summoner:2}}
Poppy's Standfast Presence shouldnt stop Malphites ulti.. its called unstoppable force so if rito arent smoking too much koosh they'll know whats up
URF is all I need.
lollipoppy..........
